intro: Pentzia stellata, commonly known as the star pentzia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features showy, star-shaped yellow flowers that bloom in spring and summer. It typically grows in coastal areas and sandy soils, thriving in full sun. Pentzia stellata is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively low maintenance.
